name: **Glassillaun**
description: Glassillaun L642-603 Sheet 37 A small islet just SW of Freaghillaun South. Land onto a rocky/pebbly beach on S side. Some steep and awkward climbing from landing onto a rough heather/grass top. No water. No camping. The only interesting feature is the very craggy S side and the nice views into Ballinakill Harbour and out to Inisbofin. Two types of sally trees are trying to get a foothold.
